name: SWEN 101
description: An introductory course into Software Engineering. Primarily taught usage of documentation softwares and methods and programs for team cooperation on larger projects.

name: Math 171
description: First calculus course in a series, teaches limits and derivates

name: GCIS 123
description: First year programming course directed at Software Engineers, teaches basic programming skills within python

name: COMM 253
description: A buisness course that taught the basics of writing a variety of buisness documents effectively.

name: GCIS 124
description: First year programming course, teaches basics of coding in Java and concepts within Object Oriented programming

name: MATH 190
description: Discrete math course focused on computing and logic, teaches the basics of logical operators, sets, set operators, and proofs in a mathematical context

name: Math 172
description: Second calculus course in a series, teaches integrals

name: SWEN 250
description: Software Engineering course that teaches basics of C, gcc, and valgrind. Introduced concepts such as pointers, memory management, and structs

name: SWEN 261
description: Project based Software Engineering course, worked alongside a team to develop a basic spring server and angular frontend.

name: MATH 241
description: Linear algebra course, teaches vector math, matricies, eigenvalues, and eigenspaces

name: MATH 173
description: Final course in base calculus sequence, expands on integrals, polar coordinates, and series representations of functions

name: CSEC 140
description: Entry level course into cybersecurity, teaches the basics of hashing, encryption, and data security

name: CSCI 243*
description: Teaches the details of how programs execute, as well as the features given by operating systems. Goes further into detail about C programming

name: STAT 205*
description: A statistics course focused on modeling and analyzing data

name: SWEN 262*
description: A course focused on design principals within programming, as well as the architecture used when programming

name: SWEN 344*
description: Software engineering course focused on how backend and frontend systems are built.
